ing: 4 (2.05 ounce) bars milk chocolate covered caramel and nougat candy bars (e.g. Milky WayÂ®)
des: "This is an excellent icing that I use on my yellow cupcakes."
ins: Place candy bars, butter, milk and vanilla in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on High for 30 seconds; stir. Heat for an additional 10 seconds, remove the bowl from the mircrowave and stir again. Add confectioners' sugar and stir until smooth and creamy.
